tool_description: This API is used for storing data related to hotels and bookings made by customers.
name: Hotel Services
title: Hotel Services

api_list.name: GETBookings
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotel-services.p.rapidapi.com/api/booking/id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotel-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hotel-services.p.rapidapi.com/api/booking/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotel-services.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
